text: This is a list of rivers in the Dominican Republic. They are arranged in clockwise order around the island starting in the northwest corner. Tributaries are indented under each larger stream's name. *Dajabón River (Massacre River) *Yaque del Norte River **Mao River *Yuna River **Camú River *Guamira River *Yuma River *Chavón River *Soco River *Iguamo River (Higuamo River) *Ozama River **Isabela River **Yabacao River *Haina River *Ocoa River *Nizao River *Yaque del Sur River **Limón River **San Juan River *Rivière Soliette *Pedernales River *Artibonite River **Macasía River **Libón River ==References== * The Columbia Gazetteer of North America. 2000. * GEOnet Names Server *CIA map * Dominican Republic Dominican Republic rivers
title: List of rivers of the Dominican Republic
